column1: # Goal: provide Z anchors for a depth-aware network model.
# - There is no single open official dataset with platform depths for the entire Underground.
# - This table is intended to be curated over time with citations.
# - depth_m is "metres below ground" (positive number). If unknown
# - Prefer NaPTAN station ids (TfL uses these as naptanId for Tube stations
# - Bakerloo line: partial (14 stations with depths)
# - Central line: partial (10 stations with depths)
